articles.title: Rice Owls Win Superbowl, Surprised NFL Fans React
articles.body: In a sports upset few could have imagined, the Rice Owls defeated the New England Patriots 34-7 in the Superbowl.

articles.title: Rice Band Deflated Footballs
articles.body: Rice bandmembers thought they were just making fun of Deflategate, but their prank somehow propelled the Owls to victory.

articles.title: North Servery Receives Three Michelin Stars
articles.body: Rice president David Leebron congratulated the servery on its culinary accomplishments. Said one student, "Sure, it's an impressive win, and I never knew ramen could be so good, but it seems a bit much when they put gold leaf in everything."
